CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Taste Testing stage positioned above or below the In-Store Promotion stage?
SRP.A: The Taste Testing stage is positioned {above} the In-Store Promotion stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {638}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage In-Store Promotion?
VE.A: The value of stage In-Store Promotion is {387}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Taste Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Taste Testing is {1131}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {1131}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Customer Purchase, with a value of {191}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {196} Thousand Bottles from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {240} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion?
SC.A: Decreased by {251} Thousand Bottles from stage Retail Placement to stage In-Store Promotion.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 512? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Taste Testing} stage has {1131}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {891}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {638}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 764? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Retail Placement} stage has {638}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {387}, the {Customer Purchase} stage has {191}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 289 and 1011? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {891}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {638}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {387}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Retail Placement} to {In-Store Promotion} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to stage {Retail Placement} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Launch in Market} and {Retail Placement} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {In-Store Promotion} and {Customer Purchase} stages.
